title: captaIMS
description: captaIMS is a cloud-based Insurance Agency Management System designed by Insurance Professionals for Insurance Professionals just like you.  And like you, they're tired of Insurance AMS/CRM systems that cost too much and make you pay for features that you'll never use.  That's where we come in.   captaIMS integrates enterprise features in a cloud-based system while keeping things simple and affordable.  Even better, if we don't provide you what you're looking for, let us know, and we may be able to build it for you. We're always looking to improve our services.
